title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.2 - Map plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.2 - Map plan

State Regulations
A county inaugurating a tax map program prior to contracting
therefore or instituting an in-house program shall submit a plan for the
preparation of such maps to ORPTS for advice and preliminary approval. Any
departure with respect to specific provisions of this Part must receive the
prior written approval of ORPTS. The technical specifications shall be specific
as to type and accuracy of base manuscript, mapping scales, numbering system, materials, size and content of section maps and format of supporting
information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8189.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
